title: How to write a sick leave - Quora

response.answer_text: Writing an Application for Leave of Absence (Date) To, The Principal/Headmaster/Class Teacher (School name and address) Subject: Application for leave of absence. Sir/ma'am, I am (your name), student of class (Your class and division). With due respect, I would like to inform you that I could not attend school from xx-xx-xxxx to xx-xx-xxxx (mention the period you were absent) due to high fever / cold / stomachache / headache / viral infection. I am enclosing doctor's note for your perusal and record. Therefore, I request you to kindly grant me a leave of absence for those days. Yours obediently (Your name) Class - (standard and division) Roll No: (your roll no.)  Here is an example for your reference and better understanding. Suppose, your name is Aaradhya, and you’re a student of Bluebells School International, Delhi. You couldn’t attend the school for two days. Below is an example of writing an application for leave of absence to the Principal of your school. 27 November 2019 To, The Principal Bluebells School International, Delhi. Subject: Application for leave of absence. Sir/ma'am, I am Aaradhya, student of class X A. With due respect, I would like to inform you that I could not attend school for the last two days from 25th November to 26th November 2020 due to high fever / cold / stomachache / headache / viral infection. I am enclosing doctor's note for your perusal and record. I, therefore, request you to kindly grant me a leave of absence for those two days. Yours obediently Aaradhya Class - X A Roll No: Eight  I hope this answer is helpful to you. Thank you.

How can I write a sick leave letter to a teacher? The objective of writing a sick leave letter is to request a period of temporary leave due to illness. It will mainly depend on the reason you apply for leave, whether or not they will accept your request. Calling in Sick due to a contagious illness, such as the common cold or flu, is a solid and legitimate reason for taking sick leave. And how to write such a sick leave letter to a teacher? When requesting a formal leave of absence, your letter should include: Request for sick leave, preferably due to a specific illness;dates you expect to leave and return to the class;Word of thanks for considering your request.A good example of such a Leave Letter as a parent: I, [Name Father/Mother], am the father of [Name Child]. My son/daughter is a regular student of [Name school] and currently in the class [Class ##] and I am writing this leave request to bring to your attention that my [he/she] had fallen sick and was suffering from [Name Illness] yesterday. [He/She] was therefore not able to attend classes for the next [number of days leave] days. Therefore, I would like to kindly request you to grant him a leave for these [number of days leave] days he was absent from the school.
